name: @fast-check/monorepo
description: Test making sure fast-check expose the right typings

scripts.build:all: yarn workspaces foreach -pvi --topological-dev --exclude website run build
scripts.build-ci:all: yarn workspaces foreach -pvi --topological-dev --exclude website run build-ci
scripts.test:all: yarn workspaces foreach -pvi run test && yarn workspaces foreach -pvi run e2e
scripts.unpack:all: yarn workspaces foreach -pvi --no-private exec tar -xvf package.tgz --strip-components=1 --exclude='package/package.json'
